title: FlavurAI – AI Culinary Platform
summary: AI-powered platform that transforms short-form food videos into structured, high-fidelity written recipes.
outcome: Built a multimodal pipeline using GPT-4o and Whisper to extract ingredients, steps, and metadata from TikTok and Instagram videos.
highlights: Designed a multimodal ingestion pipeline combining audio transcription and visual context
Converted unstructured video content into reusable, structured recipe data
Deployed a globally accessible React frontend backed by scalable cloud infrastructure
lessons: Multimodal AI systems require careful orchestration between vision, audio, and text
Production reliability matters more than raw model capability

title: AI Receptionist for Small Businesses
summary: Autonomous AI receptionist that handles calls, scheduling, and lead capture for small businesses.
outcome: Automated customer interactions and scheduling using LLM agents integrated with CRM workflows.
highlights: Built conversational agents capable of real-time call handling
Integrated scheduling, lead capture, and CRM updates
Designed for real-world business workflows and reliability
lessons: AI agents must be constrained and observable to work in production
Business context is as important as model intelligence

title: PackBalance – Student Budgeting App
summary: Budgeting and expense-tracking app designed specifically for college students.
outcome: Delivered a clean, user-friendly financial tracking experience for students.
highlights: Focused on accessibility and student-specific budgeting needs
lessons: Simplicity beats feature overload for consumer products

title: AI Skin Cancer Detection (Research)
summary: CNN-based model for early-stage skin cancer detection developed in partnership with medical professionals.
outcome: ISEF award-winning project demonstrating real-world medical ML applications.
highlights: Developed and trained a convolutional neural network for image-based diagnosis
Worked alongside medical professionals to validate model outputs
lessons: Model interpretability is critical in medical AI
Accuracy alone is not enough without trust
